A-This is an important question because canvas apps and model-driven apps have different ways of connecting to data.
D- This is another important question because canvas apps and model-driven apps have different levels of control over the user interface. Canvas apps start with a blank screen, like an artist’s canvas, and the app creator manually lays out each screen and element. If you want to create a custom and tailored user interface, you may prefer a canvas app. If you want to create a data-driven and standardized user interface, you may prefer a model-driven app.
